abstract: General Electric has agreed to buy a British oilfield services firm, Sondex, for 288.7 million pounds ($583.1 million) in cash, the two firms said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has agreed to buy a British oilfield services firm, Sondex, for 288.7 million pounds ($583.1 million) in cash, the two firms said on Monday.

headline.main: G.E. to Pay $583 Million For Sondex

abstract: General Electric has reportedly joined Goldman Sachs in a 4 billion pound ($8 billion) bid for Southern Water, which supplies about 1 million households in southeast England.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has reportedly joined Goldman Sachs in a 4 billion pound ($8 billion) bid for Southern Water, which supplies about 1 million households in southeast England.

headline.main: G.E. Said to Join Bid for a British Water Firm
